stimulusHtml: A particle travels along the x-axis so that at time t ≥ 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8qacaWG0bGaeyyzImRaaGimaaaa@398D@ its velocity is given by v ( t ) = t 2 − 6 t + 8 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40BC@ . What is the total distance the particle travels from t = 0 to t = 3?
